title: DRC
name: Design Routing Code
definition: Identifies the customer location routing code for the design contact for this request.
fieldNotes: The routing code represents the followin g information%3A  Company  Street  Floor  Room  City  State/Province  ZIP Code
When populated, this will be the first choice for routing the DLR.
Valid DRC codes are outlined inTelcordiaTechnologies' practice BR-751-100-465.
usageNotes:
Required when the ACT field is "N", "C" or "T", the RTR field is "S" or "1-10", and the STREE T  (DSGCON) field is not populated or the DSGCON FAX NO field is not populated.   
Prohibited when the first position of the RTR field is "F". 
Otherwise optional.
